definitions.definition: The slag or dross that remains after the smelting of metal from an ore .
Rough masses of rock formed by solidified lava , and which can be found around a volcano 's crater .

main_definition: The slag or dross that remains after the smelting of metal from an ore . [from 14th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( geology ) Rough masses of rock formed by solidified lava , and which can be found around a volcano 's crater . [from 18th c.]
